Moo::SoftSkinBumpVertex

Moo::SoftSkinBumpVertex Class Reference

This class represents a software skinned vertex with three weights, and tangent and binormal information (for a normal mapped surface). More...

#include <software_skinner.hpp>

Vector3 binormal

Detailed Description

This class represents a software skinned vertex with three weights, and tangent and binormal information (for a normal mapped surface).
